response.explain: The error message indicates that the shrimp cannot be cooked because it is not heatable. This is because the stove has not been turned on. Therefore, we need to add a step to turn on the stove before cooking the shrimp.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(4) Move to the countertop
(5) Take the butter from the plate on the countertop
(6) Move to the stove
(7) Turn on the stove
(8) Cook the prawn
(9) Move to the plate
(10) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(11) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Turn on the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_igwqpj_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
